message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would really benefit you. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, $200 is way more than I'm willing to pay.  I'm interested in the product, but I'd only be able to go up to $80 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand that $200 is a bit high for you. How about we meet in the middle at $140? It's a really great product and well worth that price.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $140 is still out of my range.  I'm really only able to spend $80 at this point.  Let's see if we can work something out.
Bob, I see you're really keen on this product.  I'm willing to come down to $120, my final offer.  It's a steal at this price!
Alice, I understand you're firm on $120, but that's still a bit too high for me. I'm really only able to go up to $90 right now. Let's try to find some middle ground.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference and settle at $105?  This is a great deal for both of us.
Alice, I'm getting closer to my limit.  $105 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay $95, and I hope we can find a way to make this work.
